issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

4th gen iPod touch (4.1) with mobile sdk build 1.4.2.dc7b90

1.BaseUI>WindowNavbar
2.Tap "title control" with device plugged in, read output

Wed Sep 22 10:25:02 eWorld UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0xb7e6][1533] : [WARN] [object TiUISwitch] has an auto height value of 0, meaning this view may not be visible.

I found this confusing as in our API there is no way to set "auto height" - only height.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS - warning when creating a switch in a titleControl or toolbar

comments.body: Cannot reproduce warning in SDK 2.2.0.014b86f, iPhone Sim 5.1.
